name: Bless
description: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, it rolls a d4 and adds the number rolled. The spell ends early on a target if you cast this spell again.
higherLevels: Target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

effects.description: Targets add 1d4 to attack rolls and saving throws while the spell lasts.
